question: 枚数
sourceMnemonic: You have <kanji>flat object</kanji>s. You have a <kanji>number</kanji> of them. These flat objects are flat things, right? Flat things like sheets of paper, perhaps (or other sheets of things). So, this word is <vocabulary>number of sheets</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
